styles.header: w-full bg-[#FDE68A] p-6 flex items-center justify-between mb-12 shadow-md
styles.h6: text-lg font-medium text-[#FBBF24] mb-2 uppercase tracking-wide
styles.button: inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-6 py-3 bg-[#F97316] text-white rounded-md hover:bg-[#EA580C] transition
styles.input: w-full px-4 py-2 border border-[#FCD34D] rounded-md text-[#1F2937] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#F97316] focus:border-[#F97316]
styles.textarea: w-full px-4 py-2 border border-[#FCD34D] rounded-md text-[#1F2937] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#F97316] focus:border-[#F97316]
styles.select: w-full px-4 py-2 border border-[#FCD34D] rounded-md text-[#1F2937] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#F97316] focus:border-[#F97316]
styles.label: text-sm font-medium mb-1 block text-[#374151]
styles.th: px-4 py-2 border border-[#FCD34D] bg-[#F97316] text-white text-left
styles.blockquote: pl-6 border-l-4 border-[#F97316] italic text-[#374151] my-6 bg-[#FFF7ED] p-4 rounded
styles.code: font-mono text-sm bg-[#FEF3C7] text-[#B45309] px-2 py-1 rounded
styles.pre: font-mono text-sm bg-[#FEF3C7] text-[#B45309] p-4 rounded overflow-x-auto mb-6
styles.section: mb-8 bg-white p-6 rounded-lg border border-[#FCD34D]
styles.aside: bg-[#FFF7ED] rounded-lg p-5 border border-[#FCD34D] shadow-sm text-[#374151] mb-10
styles.footer: w-full text-center text-[#92400E] py-6 border-t border-[#FCD34D]
styles.details: mb-4 bg-white border border-[#FCD34D] rounded-md p-4
styles.progress: block w-full h-2 bg-[#FCD34D] rounded-lg overflow-hidden
styles.dialog: bg-white p-6 rounded-md shadow-xl max-w-lg mx-auto
styles.datalist: block w-full px-4 py-2 border border-[#FCD34D] rounded-md bg-white
styles.output: inline-block px-2 py-1 bg-[#FFF7ED] text-[#1F2937] rounded
